name: Pinni and the Lost Voice
storyline:
Pinni lives on a tiny planet where the day and night cycle are under the control of the Great Great Rooster, a powerful and magical bird that sits atop the highest tower of Hill Village.

The rooster sings every morning to let the sun pass and keep the cycle going.

Until one day, when the Great Great Rooster was ready to perform its daily cock-a-doodle-do, but suddenly it caught a sore throat and lost its beautiful voice! Now the sun and moon are stuck, and the world is split between an endless day and eternal darkness.

You must now embark on a great adventure in order to create a magical cough syrup to cure the Great Great Rooster’s sore throat and save the land from being stuck in time...
summary: Pinni and the Lost Voice is a classic adventure platformer with a cute hand-drawn art style. Play as Pinni, a brave little doggy in a mysterious dreamland where the sun and the moon have stopped moving!
